original: 'du byed 'gag pa med /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa skye ba med /

original: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med /

analyzed: ming dang gzugs skye ba med /

original: ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med /
translated: name and form are unceasing,

analyzed: skye mched drug skye ba med /

original: skye mched drug 'gag pa med /
analyzed: skye mched drug 'gag pa med /
translated: the six sense sources are unceasing,

original: res pa skye ba med /
analyzed: res pa skye ba med /

original: reg pa 'gag pa med /
analyzed: reg pa 'gag pa med /
translated: contact is unceasing,

analyzed: tshor ba skye ba med /
translated: feeling is unborn,

original: tshor ba 'gag pa med /
analyzed: tshor ba 'gag pa med /
translated: feeling is unceasing,

original: sred pa skye ba med /
analyzed: sred pa skye ba med /
translated: craving is unborn,

original: sred pa 'gag pa med /
analyzed: sred pa 'gag pa med /
translated: craving is unceasing,

original: len pa skye ba med /
analyzed: len pa skye ba med /
translated: grasping is unborn,

original: len pa 'gag pa med /
analyzed: len pa 'gag pa med /
translated: grasping is unceasing,

original: srid pa skye ba med /
analyzed: srid pa skye ba med /
translated: becoming is unborn,

original: srid pa 'gag pa med /
analyzed: srid pa 'gag pa med /
translated: becoming is unceasing,

original: skye ba skye ba med /
analyzed: skye ba skye ba med /
translated: birth is unborn,

original: skye ba 'gag pa med /
analyzed: skye ba 'gag pa med /
translated: birth is unceasing,

original: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nye bar 'du ba skye ba med /
analyzed: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nye bar 'du ba skye ba med /
translated: and aging, sickness, death, sorrow, lamentation, suffering, unhappiness, and strife are unborn.

original: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nye bar 'du ba 'gag pa med do //🔽sdug bsngal med /
analyzed: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nye bar 'du ba 'gag pa med do // sdug bsngal med /
translated: old age, sickness, death, sorrow, lamentation, suffering, unhappiness, and agitation are unceasing.🔽There is no suffering.

original: kun 'byung med /
analyzed: kun 'byung med /
translated: There is no origin of suffering.

original: 'gog pa med /
analyzed: 'gog pa med /
translated: There is no cessation.

original: lam med / thob pa med /
analyzed: lam med / thob pa med /
translated: There is no path. There is no attainment.

original: mngon par rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa med do //
translated: There is no realization.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa med /
translated: There is no stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med /
translated: There is no result of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba med /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba med /
translated: There is no once-returner.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med /
translated: There is no result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba med /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba med /
translated: There is no nonreturner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med /
translated: There is no result of nonreturner.

original: dgra bcom pa med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa med /
translated: There is no arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu med /🔽rang sangs rgyas med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu med / rang sangs rgyas med /
translated: There is no result of arhat.🔽There is no pratyekabuddha.

original: rang byang chub med /
analyzed: rang byang chub med /
translated: There is no pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med /🔽sangs rgyas med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med / sangs rgyas med do //
translated: There is no knowledge of the aspects of the path.🔽There is no buddha.

original: byang chub med do //
analyzed: byang chub med do //
translated: There is no awakening.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: de ltar brtson pa ni brtson pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar brtson pa ni brtson pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa la gdams pa'o //
translated: those who are diligent in that way should be called ‘diligent.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @56a * //🔽pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bdag nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @56a * // pa la spyod pa'i tshe / bdag nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: “Furthermore, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,🔽they do not consider themselves to be diligent

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: in the perfection of generosity or not diligent in the perfection of generosity.🔽They do not consider themselves to be diligent

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: in the perfection of ethical discipline or not diligent in the perfection of ethical discipline.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo//
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo//
translated: They do not consider themselves to be diligent

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: in the perfection of patience or not diligent in the perfection of patience.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see that they are ‘striving’ in the perfection of perseverance,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are ‘not striving’ in the perfection of perseverance.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that they are ‘striving’ in the perfection of concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are ‘not striving’ in the perfection of concentration.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that they are ‘striving’ in the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are ‘not striving’ in the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that they are ‘striving’ in form,

original: gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are ‘not striving’ in form.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
translated: They do not see that they are ‘striving’ in feeling,

original: tshor ba la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: tshor ba la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are ‘not striving’ in feeling.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see that they are ‘striving’ in perception,

original: 'du shes la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'du shes la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: or that they are ‘not striving’ in perception.

original: 'du byed rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: “Strive in the formative factors” means🔽

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not see volitions as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mig la brtson zhes bya ba 'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mig la brtson zhes bya ba 'am /
translated: He does not see consciousness as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rna ba la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rna ba la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not see the eyes as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sna la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sna la brtson zhes bya ba'am / mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see the ears as being either engaged or not engaged.🔽He does not see the nose as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: lce la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lce la brtson zhes bya ba'am / mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see the tongue as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: lus la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: lus la brtson zhes bya ba'am / mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see the body as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not see the thinking mind as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: they do not see that they are diligent or not diligent.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sgra la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sgra la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not see that form is diligent or not diligent.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dri la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang @56b dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ro la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dri la brtson zhes bya ba'am / mi brtson zhes bya bar yang @56b dag par rjes su mi mthong / ro la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not see that sound is diligent or not diligent.🔽They do not see that smell is diligent or not diligent.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽reg la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / reg la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not see that taste is diligent or not diligent.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽chos la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not see that feeling is diligent or not diligent.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am /
translated: They do not see that dharmas are diligent or not diligent.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the applications of mindfulness as diligent or not diligent.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: “They are diligent in the four right efforts.”🔽

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /🔽mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dbang po rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am / mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dbang po rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the right efforts.🔽He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the bases of supernatural power.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽stobs rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stobs rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the faculties.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the powers.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽lam rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / lam rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the branches of enlightenment.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the path.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in the four fearlessnesses.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is not striving.🔽He does not consider that he is striving for the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the six superknowledges;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the ten tathāgata powers;

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the four fearlessnesses;🔽they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas /🔽rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not consider that they are diligent or not diligent with regard to the knowledge of all aspects up to and including the knowledge of all aspects that is endowed with the highest of all aspects.🔽“

original: sh'a ri'i bu des na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu des na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
translated: “Śāriputra, therefore, by this line of reasoning you should understand that🔽

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //🔽sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub @57a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o // sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub @57a * //
translated: “Therefore, Śāriputra, you should know that the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are practicing the perfection of wisdom should be called ‘diligent.’

original: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: they do not practice emptiness with emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
translated: but they do not practice the yoga of emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma med pas sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma med pas sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not practice signlessness with signlessness,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
translated: but they do not practice the yoga of signlessness.

original: smon pa med pa la smon pa med pas sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la smon pa med pas sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not practice wishlessness with wishlessness,

original: smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
translated: but they do not practice the yoga of wishlessness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni sbyor ba ma yin mi sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni sbyor ba ma yin mi sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Thus, emptiness is neither joined nor disjoined.

original: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni sbyor ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni sbyor ba yang ma yin /
translated: Similarly, signlessness is neither joined nor disjoined.

original: mi sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Wishlessness is neither joined nor disjoined.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being who practices like this is said to be practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste /
translated: they engage with the emptiness of the intrinsic defining characteristics of phenomena.

original: de de ltar 'jug pa na gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed 'byed par mi byed de /
analyzed: de de ltar 'jug pa na gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed 'byed par mi byed de /
translated: When they engage like this, they do not join with form or separate from it.

original: tshor ba la sbyor bar mi byed 'byed par mi byed /

original: 'di ltar gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see form at all.

original: sgra la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: sgra la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to sound,

original: 'di ltar sgra nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see sound at all.

original: dri la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi @59a * //
analyzed: dri la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi @59a * //
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to smell,

original: byed de / 'di ltar dri nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byed de / 'di ltar dri nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see smell at all.

original: ro la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: ro la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to taste,

original: 'di ltar ro nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar ro nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see taste at all.

original: reg la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: reg la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to feeling,

original: 'di ltar reg nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar reg nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see feeling at all.

original: chos la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: chos la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to dharmas,🔽because they do not see dharmas at all.

original: 'di ltar chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, they do not see the true nature.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice like that, they are said to be diligent in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: they do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to the perfection of generosity.

original: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, they do not see the perfection of generosity itself.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to the perfection of discipline.

original: 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, they do not see the perfection of discipline itself.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not join the perfection of patience with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see even the perfection of patience itself.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not join the perfection of perseverance with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see even the perfection of perseverance itself.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not join the perfection of concentration with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not see even the perfection of concentration itself.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not join the perfection of wisdom with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, they do not see the perfection of wisdom itself.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not connect the applications of mindfulness with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, they do not see the applications of mindfulness themselves.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la rnam pa thams cad @59b mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la rnam pa thams cad @59b mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not connect the right efforts with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, they do not see the right efforts themselves.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not connect the legs of miraculous power with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, they do not see the legs of miraculous power themselves.

original: dbang po rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not connect the faculties with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar dbang po nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In that case, they do not see the faculties as real.

original: stobs rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: stobs rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to the powers.

original: 'di ltar stobs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar stobs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In that case, they do not see the powers as real.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to the branches of awakening.

original: 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In that case, they do not see the branches of awakening as real.

original: lam rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: lam rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to the paths.

original: 'di ltar lam nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar lam nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In that case, they do not see the paths as real.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: They do not apply the knowledge of all aspects to the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In that case, they do not see the detailed and thorough knowledges as real.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /🔽'di ltar mi 'jigs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de / 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the fearlessnesses.🔽He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the fearlessnesses, because he does not see any fearlessnesses.🔽He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the clairvoyances.

original: 'di ltar mngon par shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the clairvoyances, because he does not see any clairvoyances.🔽He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the ten powers of a tathāgata.

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the ten powers of a tathāgata, because he does not see any ten powers of a tathāgata.🔽He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not apply the knowledge of path aspects to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, because he does not see any eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that should be said to be striving in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @60a * //🔽la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @60a * // la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: do not connect the Buddha with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see the Buddha;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: do not connect the knowledge of all aspects with the Buddha,

original: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see the knowledge of all aspects;

original: byang chub la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: byang chub la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: do not connect awakening with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: 'di ltar byang chub nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: because they do not see awakening;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: He does not practice enlightenment for the knowledge of all modes.

original: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: For he does not see the knowledge of all modes.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sangs rgyas nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Buddhahood is the knowledge of all modes.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sangs rgyas so //🔽byang chub nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sangs rgyas so // byang chub nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all modes is Buddhahood.🔽Enlightenment is the knowledge of all modes.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub bo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub bo //
translated: The knowledge of all modes is enlightenment.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog la gdams pa'o //
translated: “ Sariputra, a Bodhisattva-Mahasattva who is thus active should be called ‘active in the perfection of wisdom.’ ”

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Sariputra, when a Bodhisattva-Mahasattva is active in the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is existent,’

original: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is nonexistent,’🔽one does not engage with the statement ‘form is permanent,’

original: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is impermanent,’

original: gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is happiness,’

original: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is suffering,’🔽one does not engage with the statement ‘form is a self,’

original: gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is not a self,’🔽one does not engage with the statement ‘form is calm,’

original: gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘form is not calm,’🔽one does not engage with the statement ‘feeling is existent,’

original: tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘feeling is nonexistent,’🔽one does not engage with the statement ‘feeling is permanent,’

original: tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘feeling is impermanent,’

original: tshor ba bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘feeling is happiness,’

original: tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one does not engage with the statement ‘feeling is suffering,’

original: tshor ba bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘self’ to feeling.

original: tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘selfless’ to feeling.

original: tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘peaceful’ to feeling.

original: @60b tshor ba ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: @60b tshor ba ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘not peaceful’ to feeling.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘existent’ to perception.

original: 'du shes dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du shes rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘nonexistent’ to perception.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘permanent’ to perception.

original: 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘impermanent’ to perception.

original: 'du shes bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘happiness’ to perception.

original: 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du shes bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘suffering’ to perception.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘self’ to perception.

original: 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘selfless’ to perception.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘peaceful’ to perception.

original: 'du shes ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘not peaceful’ to perception.

original: 'du byed rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘existent’ to volitional factors.

original: 'du byed rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du byed rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du byed rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is not a thing.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is permanent.’

original: 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is impermanent.’

original: 'du byed rnams bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is happiness.’

analyzed: 'du byed rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du byed rnams bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is suffering.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is a self.’

original: 'du byed rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du byed rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du byed rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is not a self.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is peace.’

original: 'du byed rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is not a thing.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is permanent.’

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is impermanent.’

original: rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term “happy” to consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term “unhappy” to consciousness.🔽He does not apply the term “self” to consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term “selfless” to consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term “calm” to consciousness.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: gzugs mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

translated: He does not apply the term “not empty” to form.

analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // gzugs smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar yang mi sbyor ro // tshor ba stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //

original: tshor ba mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: tshor ba mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro // tshor @61a * //

analyzed: ba mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // tshor ba smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘signless’ to feeling.🔽They do not apply the term ‘with wishes’ to feeling.

original: tshor ba smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // 'du shes stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘wish less’ to feeling.🔽They do not apply the term ‘empty’ to perception.

original: 'du shes mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro // 'du shes mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘nonempty’ to perception.🔽They do not apply the term ‘with signs’ to perception.

original: 'du shes mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro // 'du shes smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘signless’ to perception.🔽They do not apply the term ‘with wishes’ to perception.

original: 'du shes smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽'du byed rnams stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // 'du byed rnams stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘wishless’ to perception.🔽They do not apply the term ‘empty’ to formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed rnams mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘nonempty’ to formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed rnams mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘with signs’ to formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed rnams mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽'du byed rnams smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // 'du byed rnams smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is signless’ or ‘the compounded is wishless. ’

original: 'du byed rnams smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is with an existent thing’ or ‘the compounded is without an existent thing. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the compounded is empty’ or ‘the compounded is not empty. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is empty’ or ‘consciousness is not empty. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is with a sign’ or ‘consciousness is signless. ’

original: rnam par shes pa mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa mtshan ma dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is wishless’ or ‘consciousness is with a wish. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is existent’ or ‘consciousness is nonexistent. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is calm’ or ‘consciousness is not calm. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is void’ or ‘consciousness is not void. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is afflicted’ or ‘consciousness is purified. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is produced’ or ‘consciousness is stopped. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is taken up’ or ‘consciousness is not taken up. ’

original: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa smon pa dang bcas zhes kyang mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is increased’ or ‘consciousness is decreased. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is past’ or ‘consciousness is future’ or ‘consciousness is present. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is internal’ or ‘consciousness is external. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is compounded’ or ‘consciousness is uncompounded. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is defiled’ or ‘consciousness is purified. ’

original: rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro //🔽gang zhig de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces kyang mi sbyor ro // gang zhig de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is conditioned’ or ‘consciousness is unconditioned. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is virtue’ or ‘consciousness is nonvirtue. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is with outflows’ or ‘consciousness is without outflows. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is with a substrate’ or ‘consciousness is without a substrate. ’

original: mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is with a support’ or ‘consciousness is without a support. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is a view’ or ‘consciousness is not a view. ’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness is a śrāvaka’ or ‘consciousness is not a

original: spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend that ‘I am practicing’ or ‘I am not practicing.’

original: spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend that ‘I am practicing and not practicing’ or ‘I am neither practicing nor not practicing.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that are said to be endeavoring in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: they do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of perseverance.

original: @61b bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: @61b bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of wisdom.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the irreversible level.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of bringing beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of purifying a buddhafield.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the four fearlessnesses.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid @62a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid @62a * //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of suchness.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the dharma-element.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the reality-limit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Because the bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos gang la yang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang la yang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: does not see any dharma as different.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: The bodhisattva, the great being, who courses thus in the perfection of wisdom,

original: lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the divine eye.

original: lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the divine ear.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the knowledge of the minds of others.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the recollection of former lives.

original: rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the superknowledges.

original: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Because when he practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
translated: he does not even see the perfection of wisdom, let alone the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa' lta gang zhig mngon par shes pa thams cad lta gang las yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lta gang zhig mngon par shes pa thams cad lta gang las yin /
translated: What bodhisattva and what knowledge of all aspects could there be?

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom like this should be called ‘diligent.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: He does not think, ‘With my divine eye I will know the deaths and rebirths of beings in the eastern direction, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.’

original: lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o //
translated: He does not think, ‘With my divine ear I will hear the sounds of those beings.’

original: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: He does not think, ‘I will know the minds of those beings.’

original: de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran @62b nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran @62b nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: He does not think, ‘I will remember their former lives, and having gone there by means of my psychic powers, I will teach them the Dharma.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o
translated: Śāriputra, in the same way, great bodhisattva beings do not think, ‘With my divine eye I will know the deaths and rebirths of beings in the southern direction, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.’

original: // lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o //
analyzed: // lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o //

analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: They should know the minds of those very beings with their own minds.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par
translated: “Śāriputra, in the same way, great bodhisattva beings do not think, ‘With my divine eye I will know the deaths and rebirths of sentient beings in the world systems of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, below.’🔽

original: bya'o // lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o // lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, in the same way, great bodhisattva beings do not think, ‘With my divine eye I will know the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings in the world systems of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, and with my divine ear I will listen to their sounds.

original: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: I will know the minds of those very beings with my knowledge of the minds of others.

original: de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I will remember their previous lives, and having done so, I will go to them by means of my supernormal knowledge and teach them the sacred doctrine.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs @63b kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs @63b kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes
translated: “Śāriputra, in the same way, great bodhisattva beings do not think, ‘With my divine eye, which is purified and surpasses that of humans, I will know the deaths and rebirths of sentient beings in the world systems of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, and I will know their good qualities and bad qualities, and their good and bad forms.’🔽

original: par bya'o // lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o //
translated: “In the same way, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great being does not think, ‘With my divine eye I will know the passing away and rebirth of beings in the world systems of the ten directions, as many as the sands of the Ganges river, and with my divine ear I will listen to their sounds.

original: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: I will know the minds of those very beings with my knowledge of others’ minds.

original: de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I will remember their previous lives and, having remembered them, I will go there by means of my magical power and teach them the Dharma.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed par brtson pa yin no zhes brjod
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed par brtson pa yin no zhes brjod
translated: “Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom like that is dedicated to bringing about the complete nirvāṇa of countless, immeasurable, incalculable beings.”

original: par bya'o // sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par bya'o // sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like this, the evil Māra does not find an opportunity.

original: 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All the mundane afflictions that he has will be completely eliminated.

original: sh'a ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: Śāriputra, in the eastern direction, in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River,

translated: And the gods from the Heaven of the Four Great Kings up to the Highest Heaven will think, ‘We must protect this bodhisattva great being, so that no one can create obstacles for him.’

original: de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: And whatever physical flaws he has will all be purified in this very life.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this bodhisattva great being has pervaded all sentient beings with love.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
