translated: Śāriputra, in the world systems in the downward direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do //
translated: All the Blessed Buddhas who are present, live, and remain in the world systems in the ten directions, and their śrāvakas, and pratyekabuddhas, and the gods from the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm up to the Bṛhat­phala realm, will think, ‘Alas, someone is creating an obstacle for this bodhisattva mahāsattva.’

original: de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: And whatever physical faults he may have will all be purified in this very life.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because this bodhisattva mahāsattva has pervaded all beings with love.

original: sh'a ri'i bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: “Śāriputra, in the world systems of the ten directions, as many as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang @66a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang @66a * //
translated: all the lord buddhas who are present, those śrāvakas of theirs, those pratyekabuddhas,

original: dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do //
analyzed: dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do //
translated: and those gods from the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm up to the Bṛhat­phala realm will think, ‘Alas, someone is creating an obstacle for that bodhisattva mahāsattva.’

original: de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Whatever physical faults he may have will all be purified in this very life.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the bodhisattva mahāsattva has pervaded all beings with love.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni tshigs chung ngus gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni tshigs chung ngus gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, for the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom, the dhāraṇī gateways and samādhi gateways manifest with little difficulty.

original: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: In all his places of birth, he will please the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until he fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, he will never be separated from those buddha bhagavāns.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom in that way should be called ‘diligent.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du gang zhig chos rnams dang lhan cig ldan pa 'am /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du gang zhig chos rnams dang lhan cig ldan pa 'am /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘There is some phenomenon that is joined or

original: bral ba'am / 'du ba'am /
analyzed: bral ba'am / 'du ba'am /
translated: separated, united or

original: dbye ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod do zhes sems par byed pa med de /
analyzed: dbye ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod do zhes sems par byed pa med de /
translated: divided.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar des gang zhig ldan pa'am /🔽bral ba 'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des gang zhig ldan pa'am / bral ba 'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because he does not see the real nature of any phenomenon that is joined or

original: 'du ba'am / dbye ba'i chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du ba'am / dbye ba'i chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: separated, united or🔽divided.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom in that way should be called ‘diligent.’”

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du bdag gis shin tu myur bar chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du bdag gis shin tu myur bar chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom thinks like this: ‘Will I quickly fully awaken to the dharma-dhātu?

original: 'on te mi 'gyur zhes @66b bya bar sems pa med de /
analyzed: 'on te mi 'gyur zhes @66b bya bar sems pa med de /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘Will I very quickly fully awaken to the reality-limit or not?🔽’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do //🔽mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do // mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do //
translated: The reality-limit does not fully awaken to the reality-limit.🔽It does not fully awaken.

original: mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: It will not fully awaken.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom like that should be called ‘diligent.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'ga' yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos kyi dbyings la chos sna tshogs su yang 'byed par mi byed la /
analyzed: 'ga' yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos kyi dbyings la chos sna tshogs su yang 'byed par mi byed la /
translated: He does not see anything at all that is separate from the dharma-constituent, and he does not divide the dharma-constituent into various dharmas.

original: de 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di yang 'di ltar rtogs sam mi rtogs snyam du sems pa yang med /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di yang 'di ltar rtogs sam mi rtogs snyam du sems pa yang med /
translated: He does not think, ‘This dharma-constituent is realized like this,’ or ‘It is not realized like this.’

original: 'di ltar chos gang gis chos de dag rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang des yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos gang gis chos de dag rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang des yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do //
translated: Because he does not see any dharma at all by which he could realize those dharmas.

original: 'di ltar des ni chos kyi dbyings la stong pa'o zhes sbyor bar mi byed mi stong zhes sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar des ni chos kyi dbyings la stong pa'o zhes sbyor bar mi byed mi stong zhes sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: Because he does not apply ‘empty’ to the dharma-constituent, and he does not apply ‘not empty’ to it.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that are said to be striving in the perfection of wisdom.”🔽“Furthermore, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should practice the perfection of wisdom with the perfection of concentration at the head, with the perfection of perseverance at the head, with the perfection of patience at the head, with the perfection of morality at the head, and with the perfection of giving at the head.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽mig gi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / mig gi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they do not join the eye constituent with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la mig gi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽gzugs kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mig gi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // gzugs kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: They do not join emptiness with the eye constituent.🔽They do not join the form constituent with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: They do not join emptiness with the form constituent.🔽They do not join the eye consciousness constituent with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽rna ba'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid la rna ba'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // rna ba'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed / stong pa nyid la rna ba'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: They do not join emptiness with the eye consciousness constituent.🔽They do not join the ear constituent with emptiness.🔽They do not join emptiness with the ear constituent.

original: sgra'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: sgra'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: They do not join the sound constituent with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la sgra'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sgra'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not practice the sound constituent by means of emptiness.🔽He does not practice emptiness by means of the ear consciousness constituent.

original: stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice the ear consciousness constituent by means of emptiness.

original: sna'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid la @67a * //🔽sna'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sna'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed / stong pa nyid la @67a * // sna'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice emptiness by means of the nose constituent.🔽He does not practice the nose constituent by means of emptiness.

original: dri'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: dri'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not practice emptiness by means of the smell constituent.

original: stong pa nyid la dri'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la dri'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not practice the smell constituent by means of emptiness.🔽He does not practice emptiness by means of the nose consciousness constituent.

original: stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽lce'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // lce'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not practice the nose consciousness constituent by means of emptiness.🔽He does not practice emptiness by means of the tongue constituent.

original: stong pa nyid la lce'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lce'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice the tongue constituent by means of emptiness.

original: ro'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: ro'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join the element of taste with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la ro'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ro'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join emptiness with the element of taste.🔽He does not join the element of tongue consciousness with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽lus kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // lus kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join emptiness with the element of tongue consciousness.🔽He does not join the element of body with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la lus kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽reg bya'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lus kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // reg bya'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join emptiness with the element of body.🔽He does not join the element of texture with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la reg bya'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la reg bya'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join emptiness with the element of texture.🔽He does not join the element of body consciousness with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not join emptiness with the element of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: yid kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join the element of thinking mind with emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la yid kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la yid kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not join the element of thought to emptiness.

original: chos kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid la chos kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed / stong pa nyid la chos kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not join the element of mental objects to emptiness.🔽He does not join emptiness to the element of mental objects.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed /
translated: He does not join the element of thought-consciousness to emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not join emptiness to the element of thought-consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te /
translated: Śāriputra, this is the highest yoga of bodhisattva great beings.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro //
translated: the yoga of emptiness.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: and they will bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will quickly awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems @67b dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems @67b dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, among all the practices of bodhisattva great beings, the practice of the perfection of wisdom is called the best.

original: dam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the highest.

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the foremost.

original: mchog dang / rab mchog dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / gya nom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mchog dang / rab mchog dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / gya nom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the most excellent, the supreme, the unsurpassed, the unequaled, the equal, and the sublime.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di ni bla na med pa yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di ni bla na med pa yin te /
translated: Śāriputra, this practice is unsurpassed.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang / smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang / smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga of the perfection of wisdom is the yoga of emptiness, the yoga of signlessness, and the yoga of wishlessness.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung ste /
translated: Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being who practices like this is said to be prophesied.

original: lung du bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: lung du bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: He is close to being prophesied.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur /
translated: Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being who practices like this will work for the welfare of countless, innumerable sentient beings.

original: yang 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: He thinks, ‘The buddha bhagavāns will prophesy me.

original: bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to //
analyzed: bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to //
translated: I am close to being prophesied.

original: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will purify a buddhafield.

original: bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o //
translated: I will bring beings to full maturity.

original: bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I will turn the wheel of the Dharma.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar des chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bral bar mi byed cing gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bral bar mi byed cing gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am /
translated: And why is that?

original: gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba chos kyi dbyings las gzhan pa'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba chos kyi dbyings las gzhan pa'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because they do not divide up the dharma-constituent, and they do not see any dharma other than the dharma-constituent that the lord buddhas would prophesy as having attained unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Because when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: the idea of a being does not occur to them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med do //
translated: Thus, because of being a phenomenon that is non-arisen and unceasing, sentient beings are utterly non-arisen and unceasing.

original: gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could those who are non-arisen and unceasing engage in the perfection of wisdom?

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar @68a * //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar @68a * //
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings

original: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: who practice like that engage in the perfection of wisdom because sentient beings are non-arisen.

original: sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: They engage in the perfection of wisdom because sentient beings are emptiness.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: They engage in the perfection of wisdom because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te /
translated: They engage in the perfection of wisdom because sentient beings are isolated.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te /
translated: “Śāriputra, this is the highest yoga of bodhisattva great beings.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor te /
translated: the yoga of emptiness.

original: des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis gnon te gnas so //
analyzed: des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis gnon te gnas so //
translated: Through it, all other yogas are outshone and remain so.

original: sh'a ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: “Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing this yoga accomplish great love.

original: snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: They accomplish great compassion.

original: ser sna'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: ser sna'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: They do not give rise to a miserly mind.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: They do not give rise to a mind with bad moral discipline.

original: gnod pa'i sems mi skyed /🔽le lo'i sems mi skyed /
analyzed: gnod pa'i sems mi skyed / le lo'i sems mi skyed /
translated: They do not give rise to a harmful mind.🔽They do not give rise to a lazy mind.

original: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems mi skyed /
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems mi skyed /
translated: They do not give rise to a distracted mind.🔽They do not give rise to a confused mind.”

original: shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi skyed do zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi skyed do zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la gdams pa'o //
translated: This is the instruction on the jewel of the Dharma.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Śāriputra said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /
translated: “Lord, where did the bodhisattva great beings who stand in this standing of the perfection of wisdom die to be reborn here?

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur /
translated: Having died here, where will they be reborn?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Śāriputra said to him,

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
translated: “Lord, the bodhisattva great beings who stand in this standing of the perfection of wisdom are reborn here after dying in other buddhafields, or else they are reborn in other buddhafields after dying here.

original: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa'o //
translated: “He should know that he has died in the Heaven of Joy and been reborn here in this buddha-field.” This is the eighth bodhisattva.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal pa mnyam pa @68b nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul🔽po yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal pa mnyam pa @68b nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul po yin te /
translated: “Śāriputra, a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who dies among humans and is reborn among humans, except for the irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva, has dull faculties.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog par ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog par ma yin te /
translated: He is not one who quickly enters into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways and samādhi gateways do not quickly manifest to him.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /🔽sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni / sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas
translated: “Śāriputra, you have asked, ‘Where will those bodhisattva great beings who enter into the meditative equipoise of this yoga of the perfection of wisdom be reborn after they die here?’🔽“Śāriputra, those bodhisattva great beings who enter into the meditative equipoise of this yoga of the perfection of wisdom will, after they die in this buddha field, go to a buddha field where the lord buddhas are present,

original: kyi zhing du 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: kyi zhing du 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: where they will please the lord buddhas there.

original: na ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o🔽// sh'a ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te /
analyzed: na ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o // sh'a ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te /
translated: He will never be separated from the Bhagavat Buddhas until he has attained supreme enlightenment.

original: 'dir skyes pa de'i dbang po rnams rno bar 'gyur zhing des myur du rnal 'byor 'di 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir skyes pa de'i dbang po rnams rno bar 'gyur zhing des myur du rnal 'byor 'di 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: “ Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has died in another buddhafield and has been reborn here has sharp faculties. He will quickly accomplish this yoga.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this one:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba brjes kyang de la chos zab mo zab mo dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye ba brjes kyang de la chos zab mo zab mo dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Even though he has changed lives, he will face profound Dharma teachings.

original: des phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, he will enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do //
analyzed: gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do //
translated: Wherever they are reborn, there they please the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po shin tu rno bar 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa dang /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po shin tu rno bar 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa dang /
translated: “Śāriputra, those bodhisattva great beings who have died in the class of gods Tuṣita and have been reborn here have very sharp faculties and do not regress from the six perfections.

original: gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi @69a * //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi @69a * //
translated: All the dhāraṇī gateways and🔽all the meditative stabilization gateways are also present to them.”

original: sgo thams cad kyang mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: sgo thams cad kyang mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ Dharma following.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyor ba la brtson par byed pa na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyor ba la brtson par byed pa na /
translated: “Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are making an effort in practice,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mi mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o /🔽// / bam po lnga pa //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mi mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o / // / bam po lnga pa //
translated: “There are those who, in order to ripen sentient beings, manifest the result of stream-enterer through the power of skill in means, but do not become proud on account of that.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi po rnams sgrub par byed cing /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi po rnams sgrub par byed cing /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who, without skill in means, accomplish the four concentrations,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par byed cing bsam gtan thob pa des kyang lha tshe ring po rnams su skyes te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par byed cing bsam gtan thob pa des kyang lha tshe ring po rnams su skyes te /
translated: and who, practicing the perfections, attain the concentrations, and are reborn among the devas of long life.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas de gal te 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi rnams su skye zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas de gal te 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi rnams su skye zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: When they pass away from there, if they are reborn among the devas and humans of the desire realm, and become pleased with the lord buddhas,

original: de dag gi dbang po rnams rtul por 'gyur zhing rnon por 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: de dag gi dbang po rnams rtul por 'gyur zhing rnon por 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: their faculties become dull and sharp.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who enter into meditative concentration and also practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de /
analyzed: de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de /
translated: But they lack skill in means and, having abandoned the meditative concentrations, are reborn in the desire realm.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul pa yin te dbang po rno ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul pa yin te dbang po rno ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
translated: Śāriputra, those bodhisattva great beings also have dull faculties, not sharp faculties.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po rnams skyed de /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po rnams skyed de /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who give rise to the four meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
translated: They enter the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the four establishments of mindfulness, the four perfect abandonments, the bases of supernatural powers,

original: stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / las rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / las rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the branches of the path,

original: bsam gtan gyi dbang po dang / @69b tshad med pa'i dbang po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar snying rje chen po can thabs mkhas pas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par skye ba yang yod de /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi dbang po dang / @69b tshad med pa'i dbang po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar snying rje chen po can thabs mkhas pas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par skye ba yang yod de /
translated: and they do not take birth through the power of the absorptions, the immeasurables, or the formless absorptions. They are compassionate and skilled in means, and they take birth in order to please the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas.

original: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang
analyzed: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang
translated: They will attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment during this very Auspicious Eon, without ever separating from the yoga of the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: gsum pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'o //
translated: This is the second and third results, respectively, for those who attain the result by means of the path of seeing.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by only one lifetime, who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, and who, through skill in means, become absorbed in the fourth meditative concentration, the four immeasurable aspirations, and the four formless absorptions.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sgom par byed /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sgom par byed /
translated: They cultivate the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed /🔽mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed /
translated: They rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption of emptiness.🔽They rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption of signlessness.

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed cing /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed cing /
translated: They rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption of aspirationlessness.

original: de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas nas des tshangs par spyod pa spyad de /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas nas des tshangs par spyod pa spyad de /
translated: They do not fall under the sway of those meditative absorptions, and they please the manifest blessed buddhas.

original: slar yang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal pa mnyam par skyes te /
analyzed: slar yang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal pa mnyam par skyes te /
translated: Having practiced pure conduct, they are reborn with the same fortune as the gods of the Joyous.

original: de dag der tshe ji srid du gnas nas dbang po mnyam pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te /
analyzed: de dag der tshe ji srid du gnas nas dbang po mnyam pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te /
translated: They remain there for the duration of their lives, and then, with faculties that are neither dull nor sharp, and with mindfulness and introspection, they are surrounded by many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of gods.

original: mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te /
analyzed: mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te /
translated: They display their births here, and

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in various buddha-fields.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug po rnams thob pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug po rnams thob pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who have attained the six clairvoyances, who are not born in the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi @70a * //🔽skye'o // 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi @70a * // skye'o // 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed /
translated: who are not born in the form realm, and who are not born in the formless realm.

original: bla mar byed /
analyzed: bla mar byed /
translated: They honor, venerate,

original: ri mor byed /
analyzed: ri mor byed /
translated: They are to be painted.🔽

original: mchod par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do //🔽sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: mchod par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do // sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: they make offerings to them, and they go to the buddhafields that they desire.🔽“Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who have attained the six superknowledges, and with those six superknowledges they play, and they go from buddhafield to buddhafield, to those buddhafields where the words ‘disciple vehicle’ and ‘solitary buddha vehicle’ are not even heard.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who have attained the six superknowledges, and with those six superknowledges they play, and they go from buddhafield to buddhafield, to those buddhafields where the lifespan is immeasurable,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: There are also those who wish for a buddhafield.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba gang yin pa de dag der song nas /🔽'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra rnams sgrog par byed cing dkon mchog gsum po rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod de /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba gang yin pa de dag der song nas / 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra rnams sgrog par byed cing dkon mchog gsum po rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod de /
translated: Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who have attained the six superknowledges and who travel from world system to world system. They go there🔽and, in those world systems where the sound of the Buddha, the sound of the Dharma, and the sound of the Saṅgha are not heard, they make the sound of the Buddha, the sound of the Dharma, and the sound of the Saṅgha. They praise the Three Jewels

original: sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des de dag sems dang bar gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des de dag sems dang bar gyur te /
translated: and through the sound of the Buddha, the sound of the Dharma, and the sound of the Saṅgha, they make those beings faithful.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba yin no //
translated: Then, after passing away from there, they are reborn in the presence of the blessed buddhas.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas /
translated: Śāriputra, great bodhisattva beings who have given rise to the four meditative concentrations, the four immeasurable aspirations, and the four formless absorptions

original: yang de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar byed de /
analyzed: yang de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar byed de /
translated: then, through their skill in means, turn away from the meditative concentrations, the absorptions, and the formless states and are reborn in the desire realm.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir @70b rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir @70b rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
translated: In order to bring beings to maturity, they are reborn in the great sāla tree-like royal families,

original: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
translated: in the great sāla tree-like brahmin families,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //🔽sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag kyang thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o // sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag kyang thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang /
translated: He is also reborn in the great families of householders, like the great Sāla tree.

original: tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye /
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva mahāsattvas who enter the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions, and who, by the power of skillful means, are not born through the power of the concentrations, immeasurables, meditative stabilizations, and absorptions, but are born in the company of the Cāturmahā­rājika gods,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste /
translated: in the company of the Trāyastriṃśa, Yāma, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇarati, and Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin gods,

original: de dag der gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed /
analyzed: de dag der gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed /
translated: They live there and bring beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed /
translated: They purify a buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: They please the lord buddhas.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas 'phos par 'gyur ba de dag thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'og min gyi bar du skye'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas 'phos par 'gyur ba de dag thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'og min gyi bar du skye'o //
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who, having produced the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions, pass on and, through skillful means, are born in the Brahmā world up to the Akaniṣṭha class.

original: de dag de na yang tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag de na yang tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te /
translated: They become Brahmās, great Brahmās there.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They live in those Brahmā abodes.

original: de dag der gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
analyzed: de dag der gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
translated: Living there, they go from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa dag yod do zhes bya🔽ba ni lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //
translated: They are the ones who make requests to the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of those buddha realms to turn the wheel of Dharma.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi thob pa nas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi thob pa nas /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who have attained the four concentrations,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du thob pa dang / de dag rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa @71a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du thob pa dang / de dag rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa @71a * //
translated: and who have attained the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, and who practice in order to realize them.

original: gang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams thob pa yin yang de dag mngon du mi byed pa dag yod de /
analyzed: gang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams thob pa yin yang de dag mngon du mi byed pa dag yod de /
translated: There are those who have attained the four noble truths but do not actualize them.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad gcig pa yin no//
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad gcig pa yin no//
translated: “Śāriputra, you should know that those bodhisattva great beings are only one birth away.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: “Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, from the time they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment,

original: bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
translated: attain the four concentrations, attain the four immeasurables, attain the four formless absorptions, attain the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom par byed pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thob pa dag thabs la mkhas pas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
analyzed: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom par byed pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thob pa dag thabs la mkhas pas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
translated: They are skilled in means in attaining the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, the path, the strengths, the fearlessnesses, the correct understandings, and the distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽Through that, they attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and work for the welfare of sentient beings.”

original: nas sems can gyi don byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: nas sems can gyi don byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
translated: This is intermediate nirvana.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
translated: Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who, by merely producing the thought of awakening, fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, turn the wheel of the Dharma,

original: sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing /
analyzed: sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing /
translated: benefit countless, innumerable sentient beings, and then pass into complete nirvāṇa in the element of nirvāṇa without any aggregates left behind.

original: de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am /
analyzed: de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am /
translated: And after they have passed into complete nirvāṇa, their Dharma remains for an eon🔽or more than an eon.

original: bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
translated: This is passing into complete nirvāṇa after being born.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag tu yang sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par byed do
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag tu yang sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par byed do
translated: “Śāriputra, those bodhisattva great beings who practice the six perfections go from world system to world system, and in those places they establish beings in awakening.

original: // de @71b dag sems can rnams kyi don la rtag par brtson te nam yang don med pa'i tshig mi smra'o //
analyzed: // de @71b dag sems can rnams kyi don la rtag par brtson te nam yang don med pa'i tshig mi smra'o //
translated: They are always dedicated to the welfare of beings and never speak meaningless words.

original: sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
translated: They go from buddha realm to buddha realm, always dedicated to the welfare of beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med gzhal du med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med gzhal du med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings, for the welfare of beings, in various buddha realms, fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening after countless, immeasurable eons.

original: rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
translated: There are also those who attain nirvana with exertion.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa las yang dag par 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang nges par gnas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa las yang dag par 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang nges par gnas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang
translated: Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who, from the first production of the thought of awakening, surpass the stage of practice of the bodhisattvas and definitely abide in the irreversible stage, and who also

original: bskrun par byed pa dag yod do //
analyzed: bskrun par byed pa dag yod do //
translated: establish all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan
translated: Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who, from the first production of the thought of awakening, enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom, and who, together with many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of bodhisattvas,

original: cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni
analyzed: cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni
translated: some go from buddhafield to buddhafield in order to see the lord buddhas, to bring beings to maturity, and to purify their own buddhafield, and in various buddhafields they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
translated: This is the parinirvāṇa without exertion.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections who, having become universal monarchs, make generosity their priority,

original: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /
translated: and provide all the necessities for the happiness of all beings.

original: zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / de bzhin du dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug spos dang / mal stan dang / rten ma dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang /🔽@72a * // mu tig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru rnams dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub par byed pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rnams rab tu bkod de /
analyzed: zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / de bzhin du dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug spos dang / mal stan dang / rten ma dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / @72a * // mu tig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru rnams dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub par byed pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rnams rab tu bkod de /
translated: to those who desire food, they provide food; to those who desire drink, they provide drink; and similarly, they provide perfume, garlands, ointments, incense, bedding, shelter, houses, wealth, grain,🔽pearls, gold, silver, coral, and all the necessities of life.🔽They establish beings in the ten wholesome courses of action, and they are born among the gods from the Heaven of the Four Kings up to the Heaven of the Highest of the High.

original: tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'og min gyi mthar🔽thug par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'og min gyi mthar🔽thug par 'gro ba'o //
translated: They attain complete buddhahood in various buddha-fields, and they are called ‘those who go to the end of the Akaniṣṭha realm.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who, having accomplished the four dhyānas,

original: bsam gtan rnams las yongs su nyams nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las yongs su nyams nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te /
translated: having regressed from the dhyānas, having accomplished the first dhyāna,

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye zhing de dag bsam gtan rnams bsgrubs nas 'og min gyi bar du skyes nas /
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye zhing de dag bsam gtan rnams bsgrubs nas 'og min gyi bar du skyes nas /
translated: are reborn among the Brahmakāyika devas, and having accomplished the dhyānas are reborn up to the Akaniṣṭha devas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'phar ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'phar ba'o //
translated: and in various buddhafields fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skyes te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skyes te /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva mahāsattvas who, having died in the Brahmā world, are reborn in the Śuddhāvāsa realm,

original: gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam gnyis las rgal te 'og min du skyes nas /
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam gnyis las rgal te 'og min du skyes nas /
translated: and having passed over one or two of the Śuddhāvāsa realms are reborn in Akaniṣṭha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yod do zhes bya ba ni phyed du 'phar ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yod do zhes bya ba ni phyed du 'phar ba'o //
translated: They will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in various buddha-fields.” This is the half-leap.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag nyid kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bur sprul nas dga' ldan gyi gnas sbyangs shing tshangs ris kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi lha'i bar du skyes te /🔽thabs la mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams la chos ston cing /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag nyid kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bur sprul nas dga' ldan gyi gnas sbyangs shing tshangs ris kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi lha'i bar du skyes te / thabs la mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams la chos ston cing /
