analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so //
translated: The bodhisattva knows the divine eye of the Akaniṣṭha gods.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: “Śāriputra, the divine eye of the bodhisattva mahāsattva is not known to the gods of the Four Great Kings.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: It is not known to the gods of the Thirty-Three.

original: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: It is not known to the gods free from strife.

original: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Tuṣita do not know it.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Nirmāṇarati do not know it.🔽The gods of Paranirmitavaśavartin do not know it.

original: tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so // tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Brahmakāyika do not know it.🔽The gods of Brahmapurohita do not know it.

original: tshangs 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: tshangs 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Brahmapārṣadya do not know it.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//🔽@79a * // 'od chung gi lta rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// @79a * // 'od chung gi lta rnams kyis mi shes so // tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Mahābrahmā do not know it.🔽The gods of Parīttābha do not know it.🔽The gods of Apramāṇābha do not know it.

original: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽dge chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so // dge chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so // tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Ābhāsvara do not know it.🔽The gods of Parīttaśubha do not know it.🔽The gods of Apramāṇaśubha do not know it.

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Śubhakṛtsna do not know it.

original: sprin med kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: sprin med kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Anabhraka do not know it.

original: bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of Puṇyaprasava do not know it.

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so // 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so // mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of the Mahābrahmā class do not know it.🔽The gods of the class of the gods who do not direct their attention do not know it.🔽The gods of the class of the gods who wield power over others’ emanations do not know it.

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //🔽legs mthong gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so // legs mthong gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of the class of the gods who delight in creation do not know it.🔽The gods of the class of the gods who delight in playing do not know it.

original: rab lta'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: rab lta'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of the class of the gods who control enjoyments created by others do not know it.🔽The gods of the class of the gods who control enjoyments created by themselves do not know it.

original: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so //
translated: The gods of the class of the gods who are the highest do not know it.

original: lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de dag nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de dag nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With that very pure divine eye, they know the deaths of all sentient beings in the eastern direction, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, and their rebirths, just as they are.

original: yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With that same pure divine eye he knows the deaths and rebirths of all beings in the southern universes as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.🔽With that same pure divine eye he knows the deaths and rebirths of all beings in the western universes as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With that same pure divine eye he knows the deaths and rebirths of all beings in the northern universes as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: In the same way, he knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the eastern direction, numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the southeastern direction, numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.

original: lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
analyzed: lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
translated: He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the southern direction, numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.

original: @79b nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: @79b nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the eastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the southern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the western direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the northern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.

original: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the northeastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the southeastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the southwestern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems in the northwestern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.🔽He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems below, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.

original: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: He knows the deaths and rebirths of all the sentient beings in the world systems above, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
translated: Blessed One, what is the pure eye of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: 'dus ma byas sam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas sam /
translated: “Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings have the eye of wisdom through which they do not know any conditioned or unconditioned phenomena,

original: dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /🔽kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /🔽kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am / kha na ma tho ba med pa'am / zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: any virtuous or unvirtuous phenomena,🔽any phenomena that are reprehensible or irreproachable,

original: zag pa med pa'am /🔽nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'am / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: any phenomena that are contaminated or uncontaminated,

original: nyon mongs pa med pa'am /🔽'jig rten pa'am /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa'am / 'jig rten pa'am /
translated: any phenomena that are afflicted or unafflicted,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: any mundane or supramundane phenomena,

original: rnam par byang ba yang rung ste /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba yang rung ste /
translated: any phenomena that are related to the afflictions or that are related to purification,🔽or any other phenomena whatsoever.

original: chos gang yang rab tu mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang ma mthong ma thos /
analyzed: chos gang yang rab tu mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang ma mthong ma thos /
translated: With the eye of wisdom, bodhisattva great beings do not see or hear any phenomena at all.

original: ma bsams khong du ma chud pa med pa ni /
analyzed: ma bsams khong du ma chud pa med pa ni /
translated: There is nothing that he does not understand and consider.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Śāriputra, this is the purity of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s eye of wisdom.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
translated: “Blessed One, what is the purity of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s Dharma eye?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gi gang zag 'di ni dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gi gang zag 'di ni dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, here the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s Dharma eye is as follows: This person is a follower of faith.

original: gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: This person is a follower of the Dharma.

original: gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste /🔽gang @80a * //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste / gang @80a * //
translated: This person is abiding in emptiness.

original: zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This person’s five faculties will arise through the gate of liberation of emptiness.

original: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the five faculties, he will reach the samādhi of the immediately preceding [state].

original: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye'o //
translated: The knowledge of the insight of liberation is born from the concentration of the immediately preceding state.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te /
translated: By the knowledge of the insight of liberation, the three fetters of the view of individuality, the perplexity, and the attachment to mere rites and rituals are completely abandoned.

original: gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //🔽des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu bsrabs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong bzhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o // des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu bsrabs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong bzhes bya'o //
translated: This person is called a stream-enterer.🔽Having attained the path of cultivation, because of the thinning out of the attachment to the desire realm and malice, this person is called a once-returner.

original: de bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spangs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spangs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
translated: By the cultivation of that path of cultivation, because of the abandonment of the attachment to the desire realm and malice, this person is called a non-returner.

original: de bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang // gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang // gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: By cultivating that path of meditation to a high degree, he abandons attachment to the form realm, attachment to the formless realm, ignorance, pride, and excitation. This person is called an arhat.

original: gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste /
translated: This person is one who abides in the signless.

original: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i so mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i so mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The five faculties of this person arise through the door of liberation that is the signless.

original: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the five faculties, he touches the concentration that is immediately preceeding.

original: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o //
translated: Through the concentration that is immediately preceeding, the knowledge and vision of liberation arises. This person is called an arhat.

original: gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste /
translated: This person is one who abides in the wishless.

original: 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The five faculties of this person arise through the door of liberation that is the wishless.

original: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the five faculties, they attain the samādhi of immediacy.

original: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the samādhi of immediacy, the wisdom of liberation arises.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Śāriputra, this is the purity of the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s Dharma eye.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes te /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should know thus:

original: gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na @80b dbang po lnga 'thob ste /
analyzed: gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na @80b dbang po lnga 'thob ste /
translated: ‘Whatever phenomena arise, all those phenomena have the nature of cessation.’ Practicing the perfection of wisdom, they attain the five faculties.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Śāriputra, this is the purity of the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s Dharma eye.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu shes te /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should know thus:

original: gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa yin te /
translated: ‘The bodhisattva who practices the perfection of generosity and the perfection of moral discipline has generated the first thought of awakening.

original: de ni de'i lam dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob ste /
analyzed: de ni de'i lam dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob ste /
translated: He has attained the faculty of faith and the faculty of perseverance on that path.

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa de ni bsams bzhin du bdag gi lus yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa de ni bsams bzhin du bdag gi lus yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: Endowed with skillful means, he intentionally takes up a body.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa yin te /🔽rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur /🔽'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa yin te / rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur / 'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
translated: This bodhisattva has firm roots of virtue.🔽He will be reborn in the great sāla tree-like royal families.🔽He will be reborn in the great sāla tree-like brahmin families.

original: 'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
translated: He will be reborn in the great sāla tree-like business families.

original: 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
translated: This one will be reborn among the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings.

original: 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /🔽'di ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur / 'di ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
translated: This one will be reborn among the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.🔽This one will be reborn among the gods of the Yāma Heaven.🔽This one will be reborn among the gods of the Tuṣita Heaven.

original: 'di ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /🔽'di ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /🔽'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur / 'di ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur / 'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
translated: This one will be reborn among the gods of the Nirmāṇarati Heaven.🔽This one will be reborn among the gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin Heaven.

original: 'di ni 'og min gyi bar du skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'og min gyi bar du skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: This one will be reborn among the gods of the Akaniṣṭha Heaven.

original: de der gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de der gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te /
translated: Having remained there, they will bring beings to maturity.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will serve them with all the necessities of happiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They will purify a buddhafield.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur /
translated: They will please the tathāgatas, arhats, and perfectly awakened buddhas.

original: bkur stir byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: bkur stir byed par 'gyur /
translated: They will honor them.

original: bla mar byed par 'gyur /🔽ri mor byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: bla mar byed par 'gyur / ri mor byed par 'gyur /
translated: they will honor them,🔽they will revere them,

original: mchod par byed par 'gyur /🔽nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
analyzed: mchod par byed par 'gyur / nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
translated: they will worship them,🔽and they will not fall to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening until he has attained it.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag @81a * //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag @81a * //
translated: Śāriputra, this is the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ pure eye of dharmas.

original: pa'o // sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te /
analyzed: pa'o // sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva mahāsattvas know this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o //
translated: ‘These bodhisattva mahāsattvas have been prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o //
translated: These bodhisattvas have not been prophesied.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “These bodhisattvas are irreversible.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: These bodhisattvas are reversible.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: These bodhisattvas have perfected the superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
translated: These bodhisattvas have not perfected the superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
translated: These bodhisattvas, great beings, have perfected the superknowledges and have gone to the world systems in the eastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, up to the zenith,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed /🔽bla mar byed /🔽rjed par byed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed / bla mar byed / rjed par byed /
translated: and have honored the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas,🔽have revered them,

original: mchod par byed do //
analyzed: mchod par byed do //
translated: have worshipped them,🔽and have made offerings to them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas mchod pa'i bar du mi byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas mchod pa'i bar du mi byed do //
translated: “This bodhisattva has not yet perfected his superknowledges, so he does not make offerings.

original: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will attain the superknowledges.

original: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This one will not attain the superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva’s buddha realm will be purified.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva’s buddha realm will not be purified.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so //
translated: This bodhisattva has ripened beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so //
translated: This bodhisattva has not ripened beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do //
translated: The bhagavān buddhas praise this bodhisattva mahāsattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni bsngags pa brjod par mi mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni bsngags pa brjod par mi mdzad do //
translated: “This bodhisattva great being is not praised.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: These bodhisattva great beings will be close to the blessed buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro//
translated: These bodhisattvas will not be close.

original: @81b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @81b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: “This bodhisattva great being, having attained unsurpassed and perfect awakening, will have an immeasurable lifespan.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The lifespan of this bodhisattva will be finite.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro //🔽byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro //🔽byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The saṅgha of this bodhisattva will be immeasurable.🔽The saṅgha of this bodhisattva will be finite.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva will attain the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood and will have a saṅgha of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva will attain the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood but will not have a saṅgha of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro//
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva will practice austerities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva will not practice austerities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o //
translated: This bodhisattva is in his last existence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This bodhisattva is not in his last existence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro //
translated: This Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva will sit at the site of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This Bodhisattva will not sit at the site of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur te //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur te //
translated: This Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva has Māra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: This Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva does not have Māra.

original: de ltar na sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
translated: In this way, Śāriputra, the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva has the pure Dharma eye.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
translated: Blessed One, what is the pure Buddha eye of the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas /
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, after the thought of awakening, rest in equipoise in the vajra-like meditative stabilization.

original: sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: With the wisdom that is possessed for a single instant of thought, they attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: @82a * // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: @82a * // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the ten powers of a tathāgata,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, and great compassion.

original: mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am /
analyzed: mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am /
translated: There is nothing whatsoever that bodhisattva great beings do not see with that eye,

original: ma thos pa'am /🔽ma bsams pa'am /
analyzed: ma thos pa'am / ma bsams pa'am /
translated: do not hear,🔽do not think about,

original: rnam par ma shes pa ci yang med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par ma shes pa ci yang med pa ste /
translated: or do not know in all ways.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This, Śāriputra, is the purified Buddha eye of a bodhisattva mahāsattva who has attained manifestly perfect buddhahood with regard to all things.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, bodhisattva mahāsattvas who wish to purify and attain the five eyes should therefore be dedicated to the six perfections.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te /
translated: Śāriputra, it is because all wholesome dharmas are included in the six perfections.

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dus so //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dus so //
translated: All the dharmas of the śrāvakas, all the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, all the dharmas of the bodhisattvas, and all the dharmas of the buddhas are included in them.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang zhig dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par smra ba de dag ni yang dag par smra ba yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang zhig dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par smra ba de dag ni yang dag par smra ba yin te /
translated: “Śāriputra, those who speak of the inclusion of all wholesome dharmas speak correctly.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the one that speaks correctly.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig lnga po 'di dag skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig lnga po 'di dag skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: Because, Śāriputra, the perfection of wisdom produces all five perfections and the five eyes of bodhisattvas.🔽Having trained in those five eyes, bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: mig lnga po de dag la bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni spyan lnga la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: mig lnga po de dag la bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni spyan lnga la gdams pa'o //
translated: This is the instruction on the five eyes.

original: sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob ste /
translated: “Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing this perfection of wisdom attain the perfection of the superknowledges.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do //
translated: He experiences many kinds of supernormal powers.

original: de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g-yo par byed do //🔽gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur @82b ro //
analyzed: de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g-yo par byed do // gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur @82b ro //
translated: He can make the great earth shake.🔽He can become one and then many.

original: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: He can become many and then become one.

original: snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do //
analyzed: snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do //
translated: He can make himself visible and invisible.

original: rtsig pa la thad kar 'gro /🔽rab la thad kar 'gro //
analyzed: rtsig pa la thad kar 'gro / rab la thad kar 'gro //
translated: He can pass through walls.

original: ri la yang thad kar thogs pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ri la yang thad kar thogs pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: He can go through mountains without being obstructed,

original: dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: as if through space.

original: nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste /
translated: He can sit cross-legged in the sky

original: dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
translated: like a bird on the wing.

original: sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de /
analyzed: sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de /
translated: He can dive in and out of the earth

original: dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: as if it were water.

original: chu la yang bying ba med par 'gro ste /
analyzed: chu la yang bying ba med par 'gro ste /
translated: He can walk on water

original: dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: as if it were dry land.

original: du bar 'thul zhing me 'bar te /
analyzed: du bar 'thul zhing me 'bar te /
translated: He can touch and stroke with his hand🔽the sun and moon,🔽which are so powerful.

original: dper na me'i phung po bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na me'i phung po bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a mass of fire.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te /
translated: Even though these two, the sun and moon, are so miraculous, have such power, and have such dominion, he touches them with his hand and controls them with his body up to the Brahma world.

original: rdzu 'phrul des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: But he does not become proud on account of that miracle.

original: 'di ltar des rdzu 'phrul mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des rdzu 'phrul mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he does not apprehend that miracle.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te /
translated: Because its intrinsic nature is empty, because its intrinsic nature is isolated, and because its intrinsic nature is non-apprehending, he does not apprehend that miracle on account of which he might become proud.

original: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: Except for the matter of the knowledge of all aspects, he does not even have a thought of a miracle or the performance of a miracle.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Śāriputra, in this way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge that manifests the kinds of miraculous power.

original: de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te /
analyzed: de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te /
translated: With the divine ear element, which is pure and surpasses the human, they hear both kinds of sounds, divine and human,

original: lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan zhes bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba mod do //
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan zhes bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba mod do //
translated: but with that divine ear element they do not think, ‘I hear sounds.’

original: 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sgra dmigs pa med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sgra dmigs pa med de /
translated: Because they do not apprehend the ear and sounds, since their nature is empty of inherent existence, their nature is isolated, and their nature is unobservable.

original: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa'am /
analyzed: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa'am /
translated: Except for keeping attention on the knowledge of all aspects in mind, they do not even think of the divine ear element,

original: rna ba mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: rna ba mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa yang mi skyed do //
translated: let alone think of accomplishing the ear.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems @83a * //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems @83a * //
translated: Śāriputra, that is how bodhisattvas are skilled in the methods of the perfection of wisdom.

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Śāriputra, in this way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no /🔽// / bam po drug pa /
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no / // / bam po drug pa /
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge that manifests the divine ear.

original: des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: They know with their minds the minds of other beings and other persons just as they are.🔽They know with their minds a mind that is attached as ‘a mind that is attached.’

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: They know with their minds a mind that is detached as ‘a mind that is detached.’

original: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind with hatred as a mind with hatred.

original: zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind without hatred as a mind without hatred.

original: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind with delusion as a mind with delusion.

original: gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind without delusion as a mind without delusion.

original: sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind with craving as a mind with craving.

original: sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind free from craving to be a mind free from craving.

original: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind with grasping to be a mind with grasping.

original: nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind without grasping to be a mind without grasping.🔽He knows as it really is a mind that is contracted to be a contracted mind.

original: rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a distracted mind to be a distracted mind.

original: rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽yangs pa'i sems la @83b yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // yangs pa'i sems la @83b yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a shrunken mind as a shrunken mind.🔽He knows as it really is an expanded mind as an expanded mind.

original: che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a mind that has become great as a mind that has become great.🔽He knows as it really is a mind that has become measureless as a mind that has become measureless.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a concentrated mind as a concentrated mind.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is an unconcentrated mind as an unconcentrated mind.

original: rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is a liberated mind as a liberated mind.

original: rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is that a mind that is not liberated is a mind that is not liberated.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is that a mind that is defiled is a mind that is defiled.

original: zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is that a mind that is undefiled is a mind that is undefiled.🔽He knows as it really is that a mind that is associated with the defilements is a mind that is associated with the defilements.

original: nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is that a mind that is dissociated from the defilements is a mind that is dissociated from the defilements.

original: bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is that a surpassable mind is a surpassable mind.

original: bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is that an unsurpassable mind is an unsurpassable mind.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de /
translated: And he does not become proud on account of that knowledge of others’ minds.

original: 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that mind itself is inconceivable.

original: de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
analyzed: de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do //
translated: He does not become proud, thinking, ‘I know that mind.’🔽Because he does not apprehend that mind in such a way that he would become proud.🔽Because its nature is empty,🔽because its nature is isolated,

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te /
translated: and because its nature is non-apprehensible.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am sems shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am sems shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: He does not even have the thought of wanting to know the minds of others, or the thought of wanting to accomplish the knowledge of the minds of others, except for the thought of omniscience.

original: sh'a ri'i bu @84a * //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu @84a * //
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de star na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de star na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
translated: in this way the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom accomplishes the knowledge of the superknowledge that perceives the mental activity of all sentient beings.

original: de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pas skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pas skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran no //
translated: By means of the superknowledge that recollects former existences, he recollects one birth.

original: gnyis dang gsum nas skye ba brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: gnyis dang gsum nas skye ba brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dran no //
translated: He recollects two, three, up to a hundred thousand births.

original: de sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: de sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no //
translated: He recollects one moment of mind, up to a hundred moments of mind.

original: nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang / zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
analyzed: nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang / zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
translated: They remember one day, one hundred days, one month, one hundred months, one year, one hundred years, one eon, one hundred eons, many hundreds of eons, many thousands of eons, many hundreds of thousands of eons, many millions of eons, many tens of millions of eons, many billions of eons, many tens of billions of eons, many trillions of eons, and many quintillions of eons.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran pa nas sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa yang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran pa nas sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa yang rjes su dran no //
translated: They remember many eons of the past, up to the limit of the past.

original: bdag ga ge mo zhig tu 'dug par gyur te /🔽ming ni 'di zhes bya /🔽rus ni 'di zhes bya /
analyzed: bdag ga ge mo zhig tu 'dug par gyur te / ming ni 'di zhes bya / rus ni 'di zhes bya /
translated: “I was in such and such a place.🔽My name was such and such.

original: rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
analyzed: rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
translated: My caste was such and such.

original: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za /🔽yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug / tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam cig tu gyur te /
analyzed: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za / yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug / tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam cig tu gyur te /
translated: My food was such and such.🔽I lived for such and such a long time.🔽My life ended and I was reborn in such and such a place.🔽I lived there for such and such a long time.

original: bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas /🔽de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas /
analyzed: bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas /🔽de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas /
translated: My life ended and I was reborn here.”

original: bstan pa dang bcas /
analyzed: bstan pa dang bcas /
translated: He has the teaching.

original: bshad pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te /
analyzed: bshad pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te /
translated: He remembers his own and others’ past existences in their various aspects, with their defining characteristics and their explanations.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
translated: He does not become proud because of that knowledge of the superknowledge that is the memory of past existences.

original: 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te /
translated: Because that knowledge is not knowledge.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is inconceivable.

original: de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
analyzed: de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
translated: He does not become proud, thinking, ‘I know this.’

original: 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyis kyang rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyis kyang rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so //
translated: Because, with that knowledge, he does not apprehend any knowledge at all, by means of which he might become proud, because that knowledge is empty of inherent existence, is isolated from inherent existence, and is not apprehended as inherent existence.🔽“He has the divine eye.

original: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i bsam pa tsam mam sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam @84b pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i bsam pa tsam mam sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam @84b pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: Except for the thought of omniscience, he does not even give rise to the thought of remembering former abodes, or the thought of accomplishing the knowledge of remembering former abodes.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Śāriputra, in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
translated: they accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge of remembering former abodes.

original: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror nye bar 'gro ba rnams rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror nye bar 'gro ba rnams rab tu shes te /
translated: With the divine eye, which is pure and surpasses that of humans, they know the deaths and births of sentient beings, their good and bad complexions, their good and bad destinies, and how they go to good or bad destinies in accordance with their actions.

original: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang / yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang / yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: These sentient beings are endowed with physical misconduct, endowed with verbal misconduct, and endowed with mental misconduct.

original: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te /
analyzed: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te /
translated: They are denigrators of the noble ones, and have wrong views.

original: de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o//
analyzed: de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o//
translated: Because of taking up the karma of wrong views, when their body breaks up and they die, they fall to a bad rebirth, a bad destiny, and are born in the hells.

original: sems can de dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems can de dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: These sentient beings are endowed with physical good conduct,

original: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with verbal good conduct, and endowed with mental good conduct.

original: 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams te /
analyzed: 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams te /
translated: They are not denigrators of the noble ones, and have right views.

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa de'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ltar rab tu shes te /🔽de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa de'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ltar rab tu shes te / de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: Through the cause of having practiced well with body, speech, and mind, after the body has disintegrated and they have died, they will be reborn in the good places, in the higher realms, in the world of the gods.

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: In this way, with the pure divine eye that surpasses the human, they will correctly know the births and deaths of sentient beings in the six realms in all the world systems of the ten directions, as far as the realm of space extends.

original: des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
translated: They will not, however, become conceited about this,

original: de 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that eye is not an eye, since it is inconceivable.

original: de ni bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
analyzed: de ni bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
translated: They will not become conceited, thinking, ‘I see.’

original: rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te /
translated: Because the eye is empty of its own intrinsic nature, is isolated from its own intrinsic nature, and is non-apprehensible due to its own intrinsic nature.

original: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i mig gi bsam pa'am @85a * //
analyzed: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i mig gi bsam pa'am @85a * //
translated: Except for the attention to omniscience, he does not even give rise to the thought of the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
analyzed: lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do //
translated: let alone the thought of accomplishing the divine eye.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//
translated: Śāriputra, this is how bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge of the divine eye.

original: de mi skye ba mngon du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub ste /
analyzed: de mi skye ba mngon du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub ste /
translated: They accomplish the knowledge of the superknowledge of the deathless,

original: nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing /
translated: without falling to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa ma gtogs pa chos gzhan gang la yang smon par mi byed do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa ma gtogs pa chos gzhan gang la yang smon par mi byed do //
translated: Except for the thought, ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,’ they do not aspire to any other dharma.

original: de zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa des mi rlom mo //
analyzed: de zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa des mi rlom mo //
translated: With that skill in accomplishing the knowledge of the higher knowing of the realization of the destruction of the outflows, they do not become arrogant.

original: 'di ltar ye shes de ni ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar ye shes de ni ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that knowledge is not knowledge and is inconceivable.

original: de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
analyzed: de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de /
translated: They do not become arrogant, thinking, ‘I fully know.’

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes de lta bu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes de lta bu mi dmigs so //
